description.en: PAX Gold (PAXG) is a cryptocurrency launched in 2019and operates on the Ethereum platform. PAX Gold has a current supply of 376,086.763. The last known price of PAX Gold is 4,447.60801834 USD and is up 1.95 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 332 active market(s) with $305,678,304.97 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://www.paxos.com/paxgold/.
